BinDisposalData.title: BinDisposalData
BinDisposalData.description: This format is used to send data about disposal of an item from the intelligent bin to the Traceability Module.

binBarcode.description: Barcode from bag label. Must be at least 22 digits long

epcList.description: Standard epcglobal:EPC list (epcs are to be represented in URI format)

impactData.description: Data about the ecological or other impacts associated with the event

C4lObjectEPCEventData.title: C4lObjectEPCEventData
C4lObjectEPCEventData.description: This is a JSON representation of an EPCIS object event as used in CIRC4Life. The Eco Impact Extension is explicitly included.

FarmingEventUiData.title: FarmingEventUiData
FarmingEventUiData.description: Data Received from the UI in order to create a farming event

impactType.description: This is a URI as specified in <c4l:impactType>.

Impact.title: Impact
Impact.description: A concrete ecological (or other) impact. This is the JSON representation of <c4l:impactElementType>.

resourceList.description: This list represents the inflow of material into the process. It is the JSON representation of <c4l:resourceList>.

wasteList.description: This represents the outflow (typically not including the actual products) of a process. JSON representation of <c4l:wasteList>.

transportationList.description: This is the JSON representation of <c4l:transportList>.If the environmental impact of transportation can not be broken down into resource consumption (fuel,...) and type (exhaust fumes,...) then a transportList can be used instead.

impactList.description: JSON representation of <c4l:impactList>. It can be used to track social or ecological impacts that are not associated with material flows such as e.g. land usage.

ImpactData.title: ImpactData
ImpactData.description: Data about product specific ecological impacts. Contains any elements from the c4l epcis extension.

binBarcode.description: Barcode from the bin label. Must be at least 22 digits long

gtin.description: GTIN of the item. Required if product is a EEE item. If GTIN is not available, please provide manufacturer & model

brand.description: Brand of the item. Need only to be filled out if GTIN is missing and product is a EEE item

model.description: Model of the item. Need only to be filled out if GTIN is missing and product is a EEE item

serialNumber.description: Serialnumber of the item. Required if product is a EEE item

unuKey.description: UNUkey of the electronic device. Need to be set if state is REUSABLE, BROKEN or WORKING

age.description: Estimated lifetime in ISO duration format. Need to be set if state is REUSABLE, BROKEN or WORKING

InspectionEventUiData.title: InspectionEventUiData
InspectionEventUiData.description: Data Received from the UI in order to create an inspection event

uom.description: Unit of Measure. JSON representation of <c4l:measure>. May be omitted if there is a natural uom.

Measure.title: Measure
Measure.description: Data about product specific ecological impacts

epcClass.description: URI of the epc class, see standard.

measure.description: Contains uom and quantity as in the epcis standard, although not named measure there.

QuantityElement.title: QuantityElement
QuantityElement.description: JSON form of the EPCIS standard epcis:QuantityElementType

amount.description: c4l:measure amount of waste produced/resource consumed

sourceOrSink.description: c4l:sinkType or c4l:sourceType: Semantic web URI for how the waste was deposed/from where the resource is taken.

type.description: c4l:wasteType or c4l:resourceType: URI for the type of produced waste/consumed resource. Preferably using a semantic web URI.

ResourceOrWaste.title: ResourceOrWaste
ResourceOrWaste.description: Information about a specific type of waste produced or a resource consumed. Implements c4l:wasteElementType and c4l:wasteElementType.

epcList.description: Standard epcglobal:EPC list (epcs are to be represented in URI format)

ResourceOrWasteList.title: ResourceOrWasteList
ResourceOrWasteList.description: This type represents a material flow and can be used to implement c4l:resourceList and c4l:wasteList. Notice that, as opposed to the XML Version, this JSON/Java version has 3 Lists of elements of one type instead of one list containing 3 different types.

sourceDest.description: Standard SourceDestID. An identifier that denotes a specific source or destination.

type.description: Standard SourceDestTypeID. An identifier that indicates what kind of source or destination this Source or Destination (respectively) denotes.

vehicle.description: c4l:vehicleType URI naming the vehicle type used for transportation
